problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD中,AB∥CD,AB=5,DC=11,AD与BC的和是12,点E、F、G分别是BD、AC、DC的中点,则△EFG的周长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, AB ∥ CD, AB = N_0, DC = N_1, the sum of AD and BC is N_2, points E, F, and G are the midpoints of BD, AC, and DC, respectively, then the perimeter of △EFG is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接AE,并延长交CD于K,∵AB∥CD,∴∠BAE=∠DKE,∠ABD=∠EDK,∵点E、F、G分别是BD、AC、DC的中点．∴BE=DE,在△AEB和△KED中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠BAE=∠DEE}\\{∠ABE=∠KDE}\\{BE=DE}\end{array}\right.,∴△AEB≌△KED(AAS),∴DK=AB,AE=EK,EF为△ACK的中位线,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}CK=\frac{1}{2}(DC-DK)=\frac{1}{2}(DC-AB),∵EG为△BCD的中位线,∴EG=\frac{1}{2}BC,又FG为△ACD的中位线,∴FG=\frac{1}{2}AD,∴EG+GF=\frac{1}{2}(AD+BC),∵AD+BC=12,AB=5,DC=11,即DC-AB=6,∴EG+GF=6,FE=3,∴△EFG的周长是6+3=9．故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题考查的是三角形中位线的性质,即三角形的中位线平行于第三边且等于第三边的一半
